title: Unable to create typeface for univers-45-light font
body:
**Description**

I tried to create font face by passing the fontfamily name "Univers 45 Light" but skiasharp is creating some other typeface instead of "Univers 45 Light".

**Code**

SKTypeface typeface = SKTypeface.FromFamilyName("Univers 45 Light", SKTypefaceStyle.Normal)

**Expected Behavior**

Typeface should be created for "Univers 45 Light".

**Actual Behavior**

Typeface should be created for "Segoe UI".

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  1.59.3
- IDE:  Visual Studio

Additional Info.

I compared the behavior of GetFontFamilies() API in the SKFontManager with the FontFamily.Families property in GDI+.

Please find the fonts list returned by both GDI+ and SkiaSharp in same machine.
[Skia_getfonts.txt](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/2768577/Skia_getfonts.txt)
[GDI_getfonts.txt](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/2768578/GDI_getfonts.txt)

On further analyzing I found that "Univers 45 Light" is available as "Univers 45".  

Is there a way to get typeface by passing "Univers 45 Light" just like GDI+?

Font installed in system.
[univers-45-light.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/2768575/univers-45-light.zip)
